description_top: Monuments de l'Egypte et de la Nubie: notices descriptives conformes aux manuscrits autographes
title: Monuments de l'Egypte et de la Nubie: notices descriptives conformes aux manuscrits autographes
author: Champollion, Jean-Fran√ßois, 1790-1832
description: The Champollion expedition is an invaluable and irreplaceable record because it contains information and illustrations of Egyptian monuments made early in the exploration and exploitation of that country. It is one of the oldest and most important publications to include accurate copies of reliefs and inscriptions and is still regularly consulted for many of them.
subject: Nubia--Antiquities
